snippet.title: Maybe: Interactive stories - Logan: Ep1
snippet.description:
This video is for entertainment purposes only.
Nothing in this video is mine.
All rights belong to the rightful owners, CINAMON GAMES
Music belongs to the rightful owners.

- 

WARNING
This game contains violent and sexual themes.
This game is intended for a 16+ audience
This game has censored swearing

This game is BL (Boys Love), so if your homophobia is raging; don’t comment anything negative.

VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED. 

-

"You have two options. Follow CIA orders and kill targeted people as an undercover CIA agent. Or follow your love and betray the CIA. Which will you choose?" - Maybe: Interactive Stories

-

Cost - 20 tickets
Genre - LGBTQ+, Thriller
Status - Completed
Season - 1
Author - RUKKIS.st, Aria
Illustrator - Yon

-

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cinamongames.maybegv&hl=en_US
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/maybe-interactive-stories/id1508286483

-

Walkthrough: https://maybeinteractive.fandom.com/wiki/Kill_Your_Boss_Walkthrough 

-

In the end, I think I bought 500 gems to play just ONE route. For me, I spent $15 (aud) for a special pack or whatever. Maybe games are expensive, so I plead you not to report these videos or anybody else’s, I have bought the game (or at least the story), therefore sharing it on YouTube is not different than replaying it. It’s just easier for sake of usability. 

-

Tips
(The following tips are from what I’ve gathered from ‘Kill Your Boss’, so they may not work for other Maybe: Interactive Stories games)
• Use a walkthrough, ‘Kill Your Boss’ has one (the link above) on fandom.com
• Read through the walkthrough before each diamond choice. Some choices (that give you charm straight away) are useless, unless they give you heart points later on.
• If you get to the end of the story (before the last episode) and you don’t have enough points but you have some diamonds, buy the outfit options that are owned by the character you’re trying to romance. Don’t buy your character’s clothes, because all you’ll get is charm- and you do not need charm!!! 
-

My Backup Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9SGl3TBxM0RohTaNdRp-8w/featured
